bgRemover.title: Remove Image
bgRemover.subtitle: in Seconds
bgRemover.description: Transform any image into a professional masterpiece with AI-powered background removal. Perfect for e-commerce, marketing, and creative projects.
bgRemover.demoSubtitle: Upload your image and witness the magic
bgRemover.useCasesSubtitle: Remove backgrounds in seconds for any project
bgRemover.useCase1Desc: Create professional product photos with clean white backgrounds for your online store. Boost sales with studio-quality images.
bgRemover.useCase2Desc: Remove distracting backgrounds from portraits, headshots, and profile pictures. Perfect for LinkedIn and resumes.
bgRemover.useCase3Desc: Extract subjects for collages, ads, and social media posts. Create eye-catching visuals in minutes.
bgRemover.step1Desc: Drag and drop any image or paste a URL. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats up to 10MB.
bgRemover.step2Desc: Our advanced AI model analyzes the image and accurately separates foreground from background in seconds.
bgRemover.step3Desc: Get your image with a transparent background instantly. Download in PNG format at full resolution.
bgRemover.whySubtitle: The most accurate AI background removal tool
bgRemover.feature2Desc: AI detects details like hair and fur
bgRemover.feature3Desc: 50 free edits per month, no credit card
bgRemover.finalSubtitle: Join thousands using Nano Banana to create beautiful images

charConsist.title: Keep Characters
charConsist.description: Create entire story series with the same character appearing in every scene. AI ensures perfect consistency across all images - same face, same style, every time.
charConsist.howSubtitle: Create consistent character series in 3 steps
charConsist.step1Desc: Upload a reference image or describe your character in detail. AI learns the unique traits to preserve.
charConsist.step2Desc: Generate new images with different prompts. The character stays the same while backgrounds and actions change.
charConsist.step3Desc: Create entire comic books, storyboards, or social media series with perfect character consistency.
charConsist.useCase1Desc: Create entire comic series with characters that remain consistent across all panels and pages.
charConsist.useCase2Desc: Illustrate books where characters look the same from page 1 to the last page.
charConsist.useCase3Desc: Build recognizable character brands for Instagram stories, TikTok series, and YouTube thumbnails.
charConsist.feature2Desc: Maintain narrative flow without visual confusion
charConsist.feature3Desc: Looks like work from a single artist
charConsist.feature4Desc: No need to redraw or regenerate characters
charConsist.feature5Desc: Place your character in any imaginable scene
charConsist.finalSubtitle: Join storytellers creating professional visual series with AI

scenePreserve.title: Edit Objects
scenePreserve.subtitle: While Changing Nothing Else
scenePreserve.description: Change specific objects while preserving exact backgrounds, lighting, and composition. Perfect for product photography, A/B testing, and creative variations.
scenePreserve.step1Desc: Start with any image where you want to modify specific elements while keeping the scene intact.
scenePreserve.step2Desc: Mark the object to change and describe the new object. AI preserves perspective, lighting, and environment.
scenePreserve.step3Desc: New object seamlessly blends into the scene with matching shadows, reflections, and lighting.
scenePreserve.useCase1Desc: Shoot the scene once, swap products dozens of times. Same lighting, same angle, different products.
scenePreserve.useCase2Desc: Test different product colors, designs, or placements while keeping everything else constant.
scenePreserve.useCase3Desc: Show clients different furniture options in the same room without re-rendering the entire scene.
scenePreserve.feature1Desc: Set up lighting and scene once, reuse infinitely
scenePreserve.feature3Desc: AI matches lighting, shadows, and perspective
scenePreserve.feature5Desc: Looks like it was shot in the scene
scenePreserve.feature6Desc: No need for multiple photo shoots
scenePreserve.finalSubtitle: Edit objects while preserving perfect scenes

consistent.description: Apply the same editing style across all images

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Complete batch jobs in seconds, not minutes

export.title: Bulk Export
export.description: Download all processed images as a ZIP file

faq.title: Batch Editor FAQ
faq.q1: How many images can I process at once?
faq.a1: Free users can process up to 5 images per batch. Pro users can process up to 50 images simultaneously.
faq.q2: How long does batch processing take?
faq.a2: Processing time depends on the number of images and prompt complexity. Typically, each image takes 1-2 seconds to process.
faq.q3: Can I use different prompts for each image?
faq.a3: Currently, batch mode applies the same prompt to all images. For individual prompts, please use the standard image editor.
faq.a4: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Maximum file size per image is 10MB.
